transcript.text:
Oh you're here? How are you doing ? 
*woah!*
What is this mess...? Is it just simply an electronic issue?
Or did a poltergeist  provoked what just happen? Oh yes today we are going to get scared!
Guys today I won't read a twitter thread
Or reddit and others of the sort, i'll talk about my three favorite horror stories
one of them which made me love and get into the paranormal. Especially  horrror movies
It really is thanks to this story. So I'll have to sum it up
Then I'll put sources in the description if some of you want details
I think this is exciting
We'll start with Michel Anne-Lise exorcism
Yes I may turn myself into Voice-over. It's about the
most well-known case of evil possession
and one of the most documented. There are even two movies about it
as the story is famous. It's the one which made me dig into paranormal
I will relay it to you with an excessive pleasure
Anne-Lise Michel is a young German girl born on
September 21th 1952 in Liebfling in Bavaria
I won't speak German any more sorry
She's part of a very Catholic family. She goes so far as to do penance for others'
sins besides hers. She really is
imply in ''sin-game''. Everything is going well until her 16th birthday,
so until 1968, when she starts to have
seizures. So Doctors diagnosed her as an epileptic
but it won't stop here. Her state deteriorates ,
Seizures are more and more frequente so they think there is a psychological issue behind this.
So they send her in a psychiatric hospital for a year
But it did not become better it's even worst
moreover she starts to become depressed, so it really can't be worst for the poor Anne-Lise Michel
who start to speak about evil possession
She starts to believe she is possessed by demons
hence she rejects Catholic symbols like
Crucifix, Bible, everything, she deosn't give a shit anymore
like she blames the Catholic Church because they aren't doing anything for her
whereas she's convinced to be possessed
Then her situation gets better when she got out of the hospital and went back on the path of faith
And starts to pray again and believe.
but she's still on alert , she keeps a bottle of holy water in her back pocket in case there's a demon
but from there on
it's a downward spiral into hell , well fitting since we're talking about demons and all.
Anne-Lise talks of demonic possessions again
furthermore she claims she sees demonic faces
and also hears voices belongign to diabolical entities
she's convinced her medications aren't working , she's taking them for her apoleptical issues
to treat her depression and schizophrenia i think
anyway the doctor push her too much
so she's going to stop taking them
and it's a very bad idea. during all those years , the church refused to perform
an exorcism on her , as she thinks that she's possessed
it has a destructive effect on her but in 1975 a priest will take the case
to the church and will persuade them to perform an exorcism
during the exorcism the priests determine that there are many entites
in the Anne-Lise's body
among them are Nero, Lucifer and Hitler . Anne-Lise's behavior becomes worst
she screams and bites the priests
she even starts eating insects  and mutilate herself
in short , all signs the church considers
as demonic possession signs are there
and there's especially an audio recording that was made during an exorcism
and on it we hear Anne-Lise's voice
and wether she was possessed or not doesn't matter because it's really disturbing
because we hear a person that's clearly diestressed , I'll play a very short extract
that will creep you out but not too much
it's just to show how serious it is what happenned to this person
it's not a legend
on july 1st 1976 Anne-Lise dies at the age of 25
after years of suffering
and this story has made her the most famous case of demonic possession in History
This is the story that people enjoy to talk about
but something is even more darker after this. In fact there is  a trial
that began in march 78 that accused the priest
who practised the exorcisms and Anne Lise's parents for negligence
causing the death of a person. The trial was a bit
crazy and emblematic because it oposed
Church, that talked about surnatural facts against demonic possessions, to science,
the doctors explained that the behavior of Anne-Lise was related to
all the medecines she was taking, their side effects
and their sudden withdrawal. It means that these are heavy medications
and when you stop in the middle of a treatment it makes your brain a bit messed up.
The result of the trial : Anne-Lise's parents and the priests were sentenced to
six months of prison on probation.
Why? Because if there was dismissal it
would have ruled in favor of the priests for having these practices upon Anne-Lise,
but also that justice sees demonic possession as a reality
and not as myth or something paranormal but we don't have any proof that it really exists.
Voilà, it's an incredible story,
it really oposed paranormal to science, and what's horrible is that
the symptoms of a demonic possession, if it exists,
are really really close or even exactly the same
as the side effects of some medecines you take when you are under
heavy medication against some psychological problems or else...
So this trial was pretty complicated and it
turns it to a crazy story. Anyway, rest in peace Anne Lise Michel,
it is horrible what she has been through, either a demonic possession
or just psychological problem it's awful. Anyway, now that you won't sleep,
may I as well tell you another story. I am the
"Père Castor" of my generation. THE STORY OF ROBERT THE DOLL
oh la la, this voice! Robert the doll,
a story that marked me a lot because
it's one of the rare stories with a haunted doll
I think it's the only one with Annabelle. And this F-ing doll has a face a bit
atypical… We often talked about dolls in videos but look at this!
What is this? Who designed this thing?
In 1906, Robert Eugene Otto is a young child living in Florida
and who is offered a doll. He was still a child back then
when he received the doll which is the same height as him
And it is the maid of the family, who is from the Bahamas who offered this doll.
And she is seen as a person who practices a bit of black magic and Voodoo.
The theorie is that she offered that doll to
the son of the family to avenge the ordeal she suffered because of them.
So, Robert thought the doll looked like him then he gave it his name.
The doll is named Robert and the boy's family used to call him
by his second name, Eugene. For me it is the beginning of schizophrenia
but so be it. Quickly, there's going to be a problem with the doll
and the child because the parents hear Eugene talking
to Robert in his bedroom. But they
hear two different voices, that's what's scary. Children often have imaginary friends or
they create one, so they think that their son does so too
the voice of the doll Robert and his own.
And that he talks to his doll but
he is the one doing the questions and the answers.
Some years later, the parents change their minds because, it's no more
little conversations between the two. They hear the doll yelling at Eugene
and giving him orders. Robert is getting
a swelled head bro, you never saw that! The parents even said
that when they entered the room they saw Eugene in a corner of the room in a lateral safty position
and Robert on a chair, untroubled.

Hey, you're a doll, calm down, ok?
Often, when the parents
came back home after hollydays or going to the cinema,
they found broken things and the poor Eugene did nothing...
So he answered: "Robert did it".
This sentence is today known in almost all the families in Florida
when a child makes a mistake, he says: "Robert did it".
This shows how much Robert's story
is known there.
Time flies by, Eugene's parents die, it's sad but it's life, this is how it goes.
Eugene lives in his parents' hous, whithout them
He is an adult, he is 30, anyway,
he ends up with an extra room. And what do we do when we have an
extra doll and an extra room? Well, we unite both! So the doll

has its own bedroom! 
Eugene! What are you doing!?
Eugene leaves to study art in Paris.
Then, years later, he comes back to live in this famous house with
his wife Anne. Eugene keeps talking  to Robert the doll
Anne wonders what the F is going on, it last and last. One day she's fed up
She negociate
Robert gets out and goes to the attic. And then it's very gloomy
because neighbors come to Eugene and tell him ''Man th ere's sth in your attic
which moves. Robert the doll is next to the windows and moves from one to the other, peacefuly
Okay, but Eugene refuses to throw the doll to the trash
It will dive Anne crazy, crazy, crazy
Few years later Anne passes away, RIP. And there are a lot of neighbors who think that
Robert did it. In 1974, Eugene
passes away too, the house is sold, a new family moves in
and there's still Robert in the attic, Yeah normal it's his house
It's crazy because the famil y discoverd that
their daughter of 10 started to creat an imaginary relationship w/ this doll
w/ Robert. And we can see robert in a
in a security glass, in a fort which became and horror museum, or I don't know what.
Anyways, when we walk by we have to ask for authorisation to take a picture
Apparently, it had hanted few visitors
Doll stories are amazing to read, to live a bit less, it seems
I loved this story too
And espacially this very atipical dall, man it's crazy
Isn't it time to start the third story

relating ''noise making'' ''things moving''
''apparition or disparition of objects'', or any unexplicable phenomemen

Jannet 11, Johnny 10 and Billy 
7
August 21th, around 9pm, not so late
Peggy sleeps in her room when she hears

When she arrives, they are awake and
they say, ''Damn mom we're scared''
Last night, thay did the same, saying their bed moved
their bed moved.... This time it wass the chair which

And there are 4 knock from

it scared the crap out of then, they have no explanation
Peggy decides to take her kids to go to sleep in the living room which is a wise call
it's the best idea. Peggy calls for help to her neighbors
Begging them to come in her house to look out w/ her

around where Peggy and neighbors are in the house
Like there was someone inside the house
knoking where they are moving simultaneously to scare them
around 11pm, they still have no logacal explanation then peggy

doubtful she calls the police to investigate, they arrive
everything's calm and all of the sudden they hear the knocks
and here one of the sits

The police don't know what to do
If it's paranomal thay can"t do anything

hears the knocks
